para.text: The Commission shall maintain a register of the serial number of all kiosks used for sports wagering in the State.
If a sports wagering facility has multiple sports wagering kiosks, the facility shall ensure that each kiosk is individually identifiable by surveillance.

section.heading: Testing.
section.text: The Commission shall require that sports wagering equipment be tested by an independent certified testing laboratory:

para.text: For accuracy;
To ensure that the sports wagering equipment is in compliance with all statutes, regulations and Commission directives applicable to such equipment; and
For any other function that the Commission determines may be necessary to validate the functionality and performance of the sports wagering equipment.
A sports wagering licensee shall obtain prior written Commission authorization before:
Placing sports wagering equipment into operation;
Relocating sports wagering equipment within the facility;
Changing a configuration;
Performing a substantial replacement of parts;
Implementing any variation, composite, or new feature of sports wagering equipment; or
Performing any other action that materially alters or interrupts the operation of the sports wagering equipment.
Before the Commission may authorize an action described in §A of this regulation, a sports wagering licensee shall submit to the Commission written notice of the request that includes:
Description of proposed action;
Location of proposed action;
Start and end dates and times of the proposed action; and
Any other information requested by the Commission.
Notice of Changes. A sports wagering licensee shall promptly provide the Commission with written notice of any changes to the information already submitted under §A or B of this regulation.
In response to a request for authorization, the Commission may:
Impose additional requirements on the sports wagering licensee before authorizing the request;
Deny the request; or
Approve the request.
Notice of Inaction. A sports wagering licensee shall provide written notice to the Commission if the action is not completed as approved by the Commission.

section.heading: Change Management.
section.text: Sports wagering licensees shall adhere to a Change Management Plan issued by the Commission.
